verses.verse: In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, in the one <S%H259><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the prophet <S%H5030><s%> Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H559><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> to Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> is left <S%H7604><s%> among you that saw <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> in her first <S%H7223><s%> glory? <S%H3519><s%> and how <S%H4100><s%> do you see <S%H7200><s%> it now? <S%H6258><s%> is it not in your eyes <S%H5869><s%> in comparison <S%H3644><s%> of it as nothing? <S%H369><s%>

Yet now <S%H6258><s%> be strong, <S%H2388><s%> O Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and be strong, <S%H2388><s%> O Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Josedech, <S%H3087><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest; <S%H3548><s%> and be strong, <S%H2388><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and work: <S%H6213><s%> for I am with you, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%>

According to the word <S%H1697><s%> that I covenanted <S%H3772><s%> with you when you came <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> so my spirit <S%H7307><s%> remains <S%H5975><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you: fear <S%H3372><s%> you not.

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Yet <S%H5750><s%> once, <S%H259><s%> it is a little <S%H4592><s%> while, and I will shake <S%H7493><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and the dry <S%H2724><s%> land;

And I will shake <S%H7493><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> and the desire <S%H2532><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come: <S%H935><s%> and I will fill <S%H4390><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> with glory, <S%H3519><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
The silver <S%H3701><s%> is mine, and the gold <S%H2091><s%> is mine, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> latter <S%H314><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> shall be greater <S%H1419><s%> than of the former, <S%H7223><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts: <S%H6635><s%> and in this <S%H2088><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

In the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month, in the second <S%H8147><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Darius, <S%H1867><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by Haggai <S%H2292><s%> the prophet, <S%H5030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> Ask <S%H7592><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> concerning the law, <S%H8451><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

If <S%H2005><s%> one bear <S%H5375><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the skirt <S%H3671><s%> of his garment, <S%H899><s%> and with his skirt <S%H3671><s%> do touch <S%H5060><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> or pottage, <S%H5138><s%> or wine, <S%H3196><s%> or oil, <S%H8081><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> meat, <S%H3978><s%> shall it be holy? <S%H6942><s%> And the priests <S%H3548><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> No. <S%H3808><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> If <S%H518><s%> one that is unclean <S%H2931><s%> by a dead body <S%H5315><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> of these, <S%H428><s%> shall it be unclean? <S%H2930><s%> And the priests <S%H3548><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> It shall be unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Haggai, <S%H2292><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> is every <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of their hands; <S%H3027><s%> and that which <S%H834><s%> they offer <S%H7126><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> is unclean. <S%H2931><s%>

And now, <S%H4994><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, consider <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3820><s%> from this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> from before <S%H2962><s%> a stone <S%H68><s%> was laid <S%H7760><s%> on a stone <S%H68><s%> in the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

Since those days were, when one came <S%H935><s%> to an heap <S%H6194><s%> of twenty <S%H6242><s%> measures, there were but ten: <S%H6235><s%> when one came <S%H935><s%> to the fat press <S%H3342><s%> for to draw <S%H2834><s%> out fifty <S%H2572><s%> vessels out of the press, <S%H6333><s%> there were but twenty. <S%H6242><s%>

I smote <S%H5221><s%> you with blasting <S%H7711><s%> and with mildew <S%H3420><s%> and with hail <S%H1259><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the labors <S%H4639><s%> of your hands; <S%H3027><s%> yet you turned not to me, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Consider <S%H3820><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> from this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> from the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the ninth <S%H8671><s%> month, even from the day <S%H3117><s%> that the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%> was laid, consider <S%H3820><s%> it.

Is the seed <S%H2233><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> in the barn? <S%H4035><s%> yes, as yet <S%H5704><s%> the vine, <S%H1612><s%> and the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree, and the pomegranate, <S%H7416><s%> and the olive <S%H2132><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> has not brought <S%H5375><s%> forth: <S%H5375><s%> from this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> you.

And again <S%H8145><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Haggai <S%H2292><s%> in the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
Speak <S%H559><s%> to Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> governor <S%H6346><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> I will shake <S%H7493><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth; <S%H776><s%>

And I will overthrow <S%H2015><s%> the throne <S%H3678><s%> of kingdoms, <S%H4467><s%> and I will destroy <S%H8045><s%> the strength <S%H2392><s%> of the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the heathen; <S%H1471><s%> and I will overthrow <S%H2015><s%> the chariots, <S%H4818><s%> and those that ride <S%H7392><s%> in them; and the horses <S%H5483><s%> and their riders <S%H7392><s%> shall come <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> of his brother. <S%H251><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> will I take <S%H3947><s%> you, O Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shealtiel, <S%H7597><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and will make <S%H7760><s%> you as a signet: <S%H2368><s%> for I have chosen <S%H977><s%> you, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>
